original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1331)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(411)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，同時 <color=#ccffcc>5</color> 秒為間隔以  <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(416)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成 <color=#ccffcc>7</color> 次法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1331)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(411)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on the enemy in front of you, and at the same time <color=#ccffcc>5</color> seconds as an interval of <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(416)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts <color=#ccffcc>7</color> spell damage to the enemy in the front.
